title: YouTube Live Chat Fullscreen | Official Site
description: An essential open-source extension for viewers seeking immersion and interaction, allowing you to enjoy chat without ever leaving fullscreen.
heroDesc: Seamlessly read and write chat messages even in fullscreen mode without disrupting your viewing experience.

features.title: Fullscreen Chat
features.desc: View and post chat messages in fullscreen mode.

features.title: Customizable Chat
features.desc: Change background color, text color, font size, and more.

features.title: Flexible Window
features.desc: Drag and resize the window as you like.

supportDesc: This extension will always remain completely free and open-source! If you enjoy it, we'd appreciate your support with a coffee ‚òïÔ∏è to fuel development üôÇ
